cosaNostra.welcome.title: FBI Mafia Watchlist
cosaNostra.welcome.description: The FBI Mafia Watchlist allows you to get a list of people to put under surveillance. Mafiosi to watch are shown as a star.
cosaNostra.selected: Select the Mafioso to work with
cosaNostra.selected.label: Select a Mafioso
cosaNostra.selected.help: Start typing the name of a Mafioso to select it
